title: Knife, 18th century
markings: On blade; pair of scissors a small v-shaped mark beneath it.
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Straight lower edge, upper edge tapering towards the point. Wooden handle, octagonal in section, inlaid with mother-of-pearl and brass thread. Silver ferrule and mount engraved on top.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, 18th century.
18th century. steel, silver, wood, mother-of-pearl, brass. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-108.
